sql: SELECT shijiaotongweiguidaozhandianxinxichuxing3670.线路名称, shijiaotongweiqichezulinqiyexinyongpingjiajieguoshuju3672.评定等级 FROM shijiaotongweiguidaozhandianxinxichuxing3670 INNER JOIN shijiaotongweiqichezulinqiyexinyongpingjiajieguoshuju3672 ON shijiaotongweiguidaozhandianxinxichuxing3670.站点编码 = shijiaotongweiqichezulinqiyexinyongpingjiajieguoshuju3672.统一社会信用代码 WHERE shijiaotongweiqichezulinqiyexinyongpingjiajieguoshuju3672.所属地区 = '北京' AND shijiaotongweiqichezulinqiyexinyongpingjiajieguoshuju3672.年份 = 2022;
